about_the_game:
Dungeon and Puzzles is an award-winning puzzle game. The adventurer's ability can be changed by switching between equipments. Using a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield, and, last but not least pulling the monsters with a special pair of gloves. You have to think about what kind of ability to use for every step, destroy all monsters and exit from the room.


There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

If you clear a room by spending fewer steps than the standard number of moves, please share your solution with us! It's amazing!

Features

  • Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
  • 150 handcrafted rooms
  • Dungeon atmosphere pixel art
  • Non-linear dungeon map

Dungeon and Puzzles is an award-winning puzzle game. The adventurer's ability can be changed by switching between equipments. Using a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield, and, last but not least pulling the monsters with a special pair of gloves. You have to think about what kind of ability to use for every step, destroy all monsters and exit from the room.


There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

If you clear a room by spending fewer steps than the standard number of moves, please share your solution with us! It's amazing!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14.4
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Dungeon and Puzzles Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Dungeon and Puzzles is a dungeon adventure themed Sokoban game. The movement and direction are restricted, and the adventurer's ability can be changed by equipment at hand. Think through every step, destroy every monster and find a way to the end of the dungeon where the treasure awaits.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish
